meanings.definition: A person who follows or sets trends in clothing and style.
meanings.sent1: She is known as one of the fashionables in our group, always wearing the latest styles.
meanings.sent2: The fashionables at the event wore elegant dresses and sharp suits.
meanings.sent3: The fashionables in the office decided to have a 'crazy hat day' and wore all sorts of unique headwear.
meanings.sent4: Among the fashionables, she stood out like a shining star with her bold fashion choices.
meanings.sent5: The fashionables in the city were like walking mannequins, showcasing the newest trends for everyone to see.

meanings.definition: Conforming to current trends in clothing and style.
meanings.sent1: She always looks so fashionable in her trendy outfits, keeping up with the latest styles.
meanings.sent2: The boutique displayed a range of fashionable clothing items for the season.
meanings.sent3: Even the pets in the neighborhood seemed to be more fashionable than usual, wearing tiny accessories.
meanings.sent4: Her room was like a fashionable magazine spread, with everything perfectly coordinated.
meanings.sent5: The garden party was a sea of fashionable hats and colorful dresses, creating a vibrant atmosphere.
